1.0.name: wordpress/worldcurrency
1.0.description:
Show currency values to readers in their local currency, you can use multipe currencies per post. [worldcurrency curr="THB" value="120"] will became (~3.5$ USD) in United States and (~3€ EUR) from Europe)

Any other informations may be found on the plugin's homepage

Why Use It?

It is really usefull (expecially for travel and commerce blogs) to show prices in the currency of the reader, so they'll find themself at home ;) With this plugin you can obtain somethig like this: The price of the green curry was of 120 bath (~3€ EUR)

Features:

  • Determines the reader's country via IP address, using IP2C
  • Obtains exchange rates from Yahoo! Finance
  • Uses AJAX so that converting currency values doesn't delay page load times
  • Caches exchange
